mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cleaner ( member_id, address, income_proof, regdate, moddate ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{address}, #{income_proof}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id, m.name AS memberName, m.phonenumber AS memberPhone, m.birth AS memberBirth, m.gender AS memberGender, c.address, c.income_proof AS incomeProof, c.regdate FROM cleaner c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id ORDER BY c.regdate DESC

SELECT c.member_id, m.name AS memberName, m.phonenumber AS memberPhone, m.birth AS memberBirth, m.gender AS memberGender, c.address, c.income_proof AS incomeProof, c.regdate FROM cleaner c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.member_id = #{member_id}
